title: Shankar – No amount of grandeur will help if the content is bad - 123telugu
summary:
Shankar – No amount of grandeur will help if the content is bad

Published on Jan 4, 2025 8:06 am IST

  • Shankar's new film is a political action drama titled Game Changer.
  • He has faced challenges with past releases but is focused on the current film's story.
  • Shankar shared insights about the importance of storytelling in a recent interview.
  • The film is set to release on January 10 and features prominent actors including Kiara Advani and SJ Suryah.
“Only content has the ultimate power to keep the audience glued to the seats. Grandeur is of no help when there is no story.” - Shankar

As the film nears its release, Shankar hopes that 'Game Changer' will resonate with audiences through its strong narrative and meaningful content.
newTitle: Shankar on the Importance of Content Over Grandeur in Cinema

summary:
Payal Kapadia’s All We Imagine As Light Longlisted for BAFTA Awards

Date: Jan 03, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Payal Kapadia’s film All We Imagine As Light has been longlisted for three categories at the BAFTA Awards, following its recent nominations at the Golden Globes.

  • The film received nods for Best Director, Original Screenplay, and Best Film not in the English language.
  • Competitors in the Best Film not in the English language category include notable films such as Black Dog and The Count of Monte Cristo.
  • In the Best Director category, Kapadia is up against acclaimed directors like Denis Villeneuve and Jacques Audiard.
  • Other contenders for Original Screenplay include Anora and The Brutalist.
“All We Imagine As Light is continuing to garner international recognition.”

The film tells the story of two Malayali nurses navigating personal challenges. It has gained widespread attention after winning the Grand Prix at the Cannes Film Festival and became available for streaming in India.

title: Madha Gaja Raja release date: Vishal film to hit screens on Pongal after a 12-year delay; internet finds it hilarious - Hindustan Times
summary:
Madha Gaja Raja Release Date Announced After 12-Year Delay

Date: January 03, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

After a long wait of 12 years, the film Madha Gaja Raja, directed by Sundar C and featuring Vishal, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Anjali, is set to release on Pongal 2025.

  • The film was initially supposed to release in 2013.
  • Delayed due to financial troubles faced by the producers.
  • It completed production in 2013 but remained unreleased for over a decade.
  • Director Sundar C expressed confidence in the film's entertainment value despite the long wait.
  • Madha Gaja Raja will compete with several other films at the box office.
“In fact, Vishal and I also requested that we buy and release the film. Even though the film was made in 2013, I am sure it will be entertaining even if it gets released today.” - Sundar C

The announcement has generated significant buzz and humor online, with many people sharing clips and memes relating to the film's long delay.
newTitle: Madha Gaja Raja Release Date Announced After 12-Year Delay

title: Abhijeet Bhattacharya takes a dig at Shah Rukh Khan again: ‘He can sing his own songs’ - Hindustan Times
Actor-filmmaker Aparna Malladi passes away - 123telugu
summary:
Actor-filmmaker Aparna Malladi passes away

Published on: Jan 3, 2025 7:37 pm IST

Aparna Malladi, a renowned actor, filmmaker, and teacher, passed away in Los Angeles on January 2 after a long battle with cancer. She was 54 years old and had been undergoing treatment after relocating from India.

  • Aparna was well-known for her YouTube series 'Posh Poris' and her feature films including 'The Anushree Experiments' and 'Pellikuturu Party.'
  • She battled cancer for four years, with a relapse occurring two years ago.
  • Aparna made significant contributions to Telugu independent cinema and mentored several young filmmakers.
  • Her last film, 'Pellikuturu Party,' was released in 2022.
“Aparna’s untimely passing has left her friends and students in grief.”

This loss marks a significant moment in the Telugu cinema community, highlighting the impact of Aparna's work and dedication.
newTitle: Tribute to Actor-Filmmaker Aparna Malladi
